ARABIC: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوْلَىٰكُمْ وَهُوَ خَيْرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: No, Allah is your Protector. And He is the best of helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But God is your protector, and He is the best of helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: But Allah is your Protector, and He is the best of helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: God is your Guardian and the best Helper.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: In fact, Allah is your Master; and He is the Best Supporter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Nay, Allah is your protector, and He is the best of helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Nay! Allah is your Patron and He is the best of the helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: No; but God is your Protector, and He is the best of helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But Allah is your Protector, and He is the Best of Helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: No, indeed! it is God who is your protector: He is the best supporter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: But: Allah is your Friend, and He is the Best of helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed, Allah is your Master, and He is the best of helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Nay, Allah is your protector, and He is the best of helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Nay, Allah is your Maula (Patron, Lord, Helper and Protector, etc.), and He is the Best of helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But Allah is your Sponsor. He is the Best of victors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: God is your Master, and He is the Best of Helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But Allah is your protector, and He is the best of helpers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [3:150] Nay, but God is your Protector, your Helper, and He is the best of helpers, so obey only Him and not them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But Allah is your Protector) He preserves you and will make you triumphant against them, (and He is the best of helpers) He is the strongest of helpers.
